entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse So I guess your wife’s parents are no longer allowed into this country? It is a sad thing to see this. A country built of immigrants is no longer allowing immigrants! I understand the COVID-19 issue but this is truly becoming a dictatorship fast, and people were afraid of Obama..
